features: 𝟐𝟎𝟎 𝐋𝐚𝐮𝐧𝐝𝐫𝐲 𝐃𝐞𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐠𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐒𝐡𝐞𝐞𝐭𝐬: You can receive 200 Sheets eco-friendly detergent tablets, each with a high concentration of cleaning power. Recommended Reference: Small/medium load 1, large load 2, Super Load 4. You can adjust your clothes according to the dirty degree. (200 sheets = 200 small loads = 100 large loads)

𝐄𝐜𝐨-𝐟𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐝𝐥𝐲: Environmentally friendly biodegradable detergent tablets, soluble laundry sheets are plastic-free, biodegradable, water-free, non-toxic, and made from green, natural ingredients for sustainable washing. In addition, the packaging is made of 100% recyclable, biodegradable materials. Choose Us, and let us together contribute to the protection of the Earth.

𝐓𝐚𝐤𝐞 𝐂𝐚𝐫𝐞 𝐎𝐟 𝐘𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐒𝐤𝐢𝐧: The ingredients of the product are: coconut oil, surfactant, plant extract and essential oil, which gently care for your sensitive and delicate skin.⭐ 𝐈𝐧 𝐨𝐫𝐝𝐞𝐫 𝐭𝐨 𝐩𝐫𝐨𝐦𝐨𝐭𝐞 𝐡𝐞𝐚𝐥𝐭𝐡𝐢𝐞𝐫 𝐬𝐤𝐢𝐧, 𝐭𝐡𝐢𝐬 𝐩𝐫𝐨𝐝𝐮𝐜𝐭 𝐮𝐬𝐞𝐬 𝐨𝐧𝐥𝐲 𝐚 𝐬𝐦𝐚𝐥𝐥 𝐚𝐦𝐨𝐮𝐧𝐭 𝐨𝐟 𝐟𝐫𝐚𝐠𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞, 𝐬𝐨 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐥𝐚𝐮𝐧𝐝𝐫𝐲 𝐬𝐜𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐰𝐢𝐥𝐥 𝐛𝐞 𝐥𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐩𝐫𝐨𝐧𝐨𝐮𝐧𝐜𝐞𝐝. 𝐓𝐡𝐚𝐧𝐤 𝐲𝐨𝐮 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐮𝐧𝐝𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐧𝐝𝐢𝐧𝐠

𝐃𝐞𝐞𝐩 𝐂𝐥𝐞𝐚𝐧: Its formula better penetrates into and between the fibers, dissolving and removing body oils and other dirt that you may not see. Our super-strength laundry list is just as effective as top-of-the-line detergents at every wash. Don't compromise for the sake of cleanliness.

𝐄𝐚𝐬𝐲 𝐭𝐨 𝐔𝐬𝐞: Every piece of paper is cut and measured. No more measuring cups. The washing piece dissolves quickly in hot, cold, hard or soft water. So if you travel a lot, you can take a little out and put it in your suitcase. They add little weight to your luggage and you don't have to worry about spilling liquids on other clothes.
body.description: Freelivity Laundry Detergent sheets 200 Loads, as low as 0.05 USD per load. Our detergent sheets offer a powerful, ultra-concentrated solution for laundry, ensuring uncompromising cleaning power. By using these sheets, we can eliminate plastic waste, reduce water consumption, and avoid burning thousands of barrels of oil due to shipping weight. Enjoy the benefits of space-saving and mess-free laundry at home with our innovative solution. Our scientifically formulated Laundry Detergent uses clean ingredients to effectively lift stains and leave your clothing fresh, often surpassing the performance of synthetic, chemical-filled liquid detergents.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #34,197 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #247 in Liquid Laundry Detergent #2,604 in Climate Pledge Friendly: Health and Household

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our aim is to create green and functional products. Each laundry sheet weighs the same as a sheet of paper!Perfect for both conventional and HE machines, whether front-loading or top-loading.No need to measure the dosage, as 1 sheet is equivalent to 1 cap of liquid detergent or 1 pod.Simply toss a laundry sheet and your clothes into the washer, turn on the machine, and you're done!

Freelivity Laundry Detergent sheets 200 Loads, as low as 0.05 USD per load. Our detergent sheets offer a powerful, ultra-concentrated solution for laundry, ensuring uncompromising cleaning power. By using these sheets, we can eliminate plastic waste, reduce water consumption, and avoid burning thousands of barrels of oil due to shipping weight. Enjoy the benefits of space-saving and mess-free laundry at home with our innovative solution. Our scientifically formulated Laundry Detergent uses clean ingredients to effectively lift stains and leave your clothing fresh, often surpassing the performance of synthetic, chemical-filled liquid detergents. Sensitive Skin Safe naturallyderived surfactants (coconut oil extract) natural Fragrance (orange, lavender, unscented, fresh linen scent) Anionic surfactant (plant-derived cleaning agents) Non-ionic surfactant (Fully degradable, 100% safe)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than other Leading Brands.
reviews.reviewText: The scent is mild yet present. they are cheaper per load than any other washer sheet. A wonderful and better alternative to standard liquid detergents... and I was a skeptic. So many loads. so little space. So light weight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Less mess and less plastic
reviews.reviewText: Basically converted to this type of detergent entirely now. It's too convenient to avoid the mess, and this lasts for a very long time and it does work. Smell is just whatever, quite mild. No strong lingering smell on clothes, which is good/ fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars so easy to use
reviews.reviewText: so easy to use and the smell is amazing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Washes clothes well and smells good
reviews.reviewText: So far these are my favorite laundry sheets. They dissolve in the wash completely and clothes come out clean and fresh smelling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love these detergent sheets. It is biodegradableAnd the box is recyclable, so absolutely no waster. Can be used for up to 200 loads and the clothes come out clean making it inexpensive as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love these detergent sheets! They work great and smell mild but very nice. I would recommend them to anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like it
reviews.reviewText: I like the sheet detergent. I buy a lot of different brands. They All do the job. This one has a good and not overpowering smell

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Work Pretty Well
reviews.reviewText: I got these Freelivity Laundry Detergent Sheets bc I was running low on my usual brand.My usual brand works very well with one sheet for a normal load in a portable washer.These sheets are twice as thick as my others, but require two sheets to clean as well as one of the others.They are also high suds for those of you who must see suds to be satisfied. But the high suds don't equal the same cleaning power.Still, a decent value for laundry detergent. You will need to play with the amounts to get your desired results.I will never go back to liquid or powder detergent!
